pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.text: We can't find the page you were looking for.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.text: The page you’re looking for doesn’t seem to exist. Please check the URL and try again.

contactsOverView.heading: Contacts Overview
contactsOverView.title: Total Contacts
contactsOverView.description: This number represents all the contacts currently saved in the system. You can add, edit, or delete contacts using the contact management panel.

downloadContact.title: Download File
downloadContact.text: Are you sure you want to Download File

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Your privacy matters. This policy explains how we collect and use your data to provide better services. We are committed to transparency, control, and protection of your information.

dataWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
dataWeCollect.description: We collect information you provide (like your name and email), data generated by your activity (such as usage and device info), and information from third-party services you authorize.

whyWeCollect.title: Why We Collect Data
whyWeCollect.description: We use data to improve our services, ensure performance and reliability, prevent abuse, and provide personalized experiences tailored to your preferences.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use your data to operate the application, communicate updates, offer support, analyze usage trends, and improve user experience. We do not sell your personal information.

yourChoices.title: Your Privacy Choices
yourChoices.description: You can manage your data through your account settings. You have the right to access, update, delete, or download your information at any time.

sharing.title: Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.description: We do not share personal information with companies, organizations, or individuals outside our service except in the following cases: with your consent, for legal reasons, or with trusted providers.

security.title: How We Protect Your Data
security.description: We use technical and organizational safeguards such as encryption, access controls, and secure hosting to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or misuse.

updates.title: Changes to This Policy
updates.description: We may update this policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We'll notify you of major updates via the app or email and always update the effective date above.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For questions, concerns, or data requests, contact us at: privacy@example.com.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through this policy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide to us when using this application.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name and email, as well as information collected automatically, like your IP address, browser type, and usage patterns.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.content: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and personalize your experience. Your data helps us understand usage trends and optimize performance.

sharing.title: Sharing Your Information
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share data with third-party providers who assist in operating our services, under strict confidentiality agreements and only for service-related purposes.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy or as required by law. When data is no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize it.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You may request access to, correction of, or deletion of your data. You also have the right to restrict or object to certain processing and to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational safeguards to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or destruction.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. When we do, we will revise the "Effective date" and notify you if significant changes are made.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at: privacy@example.com.

login.title: Welcome Back!
login.text: Enter your email and password to access your account

forgotPassword.text: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset password.

signUp.text: Enter your email address and we’ll send you a link to set up your account.

resetPassword.title: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.text: Enter a new password below to change your password.

signup.title: Create Account
signup.text: You're just a step away from completing your account creation. Let's finish setting things up.

passwordUpdated.title: Password Updated
passwordUpdated.text: Your password has been updated successfully!

successCard.title: Email Sent Successfully
successCard.verifyEmailSuccessMessage: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please follow the instructions in the email to complete the verification process.
successCard.forgotPasswordSuccessMessage: A password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please follow the instructions in the email to reset your password.

errorCard.title: Invalid Token
errorCard.text: Your token is either invalid or has expired. Please try again.

accountNotFound.title: Account Not Found
accountNotFound.text: No account is linked to this email address. Would you like to proceed with creating a new account?

userExist.title: Account Already Exists
userExist.text: An account associated with this email address already exists. Please log in to continue.

linkAccount.title: Link Account
linkAccount.text: This email address is already associated with an existing account. Would you like to link your SSO login to it?

verifyPassword.title: Verify Password
verifyPassword.text: Enter your current password to confirm it’s you and proceed.

accountVerification.title: Account Verification
accountVerification.text: A password reset link will be sent to your registered email address. Please click the button below to initiate the process.

email.duplicateEmail: The email address is already taken.
email.duplicateEmailInForm: This email is entered more than once.

password.invalid: Password must contain at least 8 characters, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character
password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.noWhitespace: Password must not start or end with a space
password.sameAsCurrent: New password cannot be the same as the current password

firstName.invalid: Name must be a single word without spaces

zipcode.invalid: Please enter a valid zip code between 5 and 15 characters

phone.duplicatePhone: The phone number is already taken.
phone.duplicatePhoneInForm: This phone number is entered more than once.

signUp.name: Name is required
signUp.verificationFailed: Email verification failed. Please try again

forgotPassword.emailSendFailed: Failed to send reset email. Please try again

contacts.duplictePhone: The phone number {{phone}} is already taken.
contacts.duplicateEmail: The email address {{email}} is already taken.

fileUpload.imageTooSmall: is too small.Minimum size is 250x250 pixels.

katakanaOrhiragana.invalid: Please enter a valid name in Katakana or Hiragana

kanji.invalid: Please enter a valid name in Kanji

file.invalidType: Invalid file type. Only .pptx files are allowed.
